scripts.release:major: git diff --quiet && npm version major && npm run archive && git add manifest.json && git commit -m "chore: update manifest version" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: git diff --quiet && npm version minor && npm run archive && git add manifest.json && git commit -m "chore: update manifest version" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: git diff --quiet && npm version patch && npm run archive && git add manifest.json && git commit -m "chore: update manifest version" && git push --follow-tags
